data.name: TechBash 2020
data.description: At TechBash, attendees will take their skills to the next level, learning from experts who share their knowledge in a fun, collaborative, and inclusive environment. TechBash is focused on Web, Cloud, DevOps, Architecture, Best Practices, Soft Skills, and much more. We provide 3 full days of keynotes…

relatedRecords.name: Future Developer Summit 2019
relatedRecords.description: An invite-only, Director-level network where the developer marketing leaders debate best practices, learn and design better developer strategies. The event brings together 60 Director/VP/GM-level thought leaders in developer marketing to share experiences.

relatedRecords.name: Stir Trek
relatedRecords.description: Stir Trek is a one-day conference in Columbus, Ohio focused on teaching software developers the latest and greatest in technologies, techniques, and tools. The full day of content is always concluded with a private screening of a blockbuster film on its opening day.
